mapper.select: select * from t_content con join t_theme the on con.theme = the.id where the.id = #{id} and con.is_delete = 0 order by con.create_time desc
select con.* from t_content con join t_topic top on con.topic_id = top.id where con.topic_id = #{id} and con.is_delete = 0 and top.is_delete = 0 and con.type = 2 order by con.create_time desc
select * from t_content con join t_banner banner on banner.content_id = con.id where con.is_delete = 0 and con.type = 2 order by banner.create_time desc

select banner.id ,con.id as content_id,img.url,banner.create_time,banner.title from t_content con join t_banner banner on banner.content_id = con.id join m_content_image cim on cim.content_id = con.id join t_image img on cim.image_id = img.id where con.is_delete = 0 and con.type = 2 GROUP BY con.id order by banner.create_time desc
